data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Doda, Jammu and Kashmir, India that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Doda, Jammu and Kashmir, India
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Doda, Jammu and Kashmir, India that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.

data.prayer: There are 21,700 people living in the county of Doda. Only about 239 might be believers.
Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the county of Doda, Jammu and Kashmir, India.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Zargar (Hindu traditions) people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Doda, Jammu and Kashmir, India and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the county of Doda access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Doda, Jammu and Kashmir, India to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 21,461 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

location.name: Doda
location.people_groups_list: Khosha, Bhirai, Barwala (Muslim traditions), Nat (Sikh traditions), Bedar
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Khosha (100), Bhirai (1,000), Barwala (Muslim traditions) (1,500), Nat (Sikh traditions) (1,900), Bedar (10,000)
